caption:
Looking for a SWEET way to celebrate the week of Easter, HERSHEY’S CHOCOLATE WORLD is the place to be! [AD] You can hop on their free Chocolate Tour ride to see how Hershey’s chocolate is made (a classic no matter how many times I’ve gotten to see it), create your own candy bar, and so much more! To celebrate the season of Spring, they even have the following extra special treats in store for you this week as well: 

✨ Photos with the REESTER BUNNY (inspired by the one and only REESE’S Peanut Butter Cup!)
🥚 Easter Egg Surprises – five golden eggs hidden daily throughout the building with prize vouchers for lucky finders
🍫 Seasonal Treats – I couldn’t leave without trying their Cadbury Egg Cocktail and the KIT KAT® Bunnies Mousse Parfait (layers of mousse, strawberries, whipped cream, and a KIT KAT® Bunny topper… yes, it’s was 100% just as good as it sounds)

And don’t forget—the World’s Largest Hershey Store is right here, stocked with Easter candy, chocolatey gifts, and even rare finds you won’t spot anywhere else. I may have stocked up… and then stocked up again. This is one sweet stop to add to your Easter week plans! 

📸 Tag someone who would love a pic with the REESTER BUNNY! 🐰 
.
.
.
